Submitter Information: HandyLab, Inc. (a wholly owned subsidiary of Becton, Dickinson and Company)
Regulation Name(s): Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay System, Group B Streptococcus, Direct Specimen Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MAX GBS Assay, a qualitative real-time PCR assay for detection of Group B Streptococcus DNA in Lim Broth cultures from vaginal and rectal swabs using BD MAX System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detecting Group B Streptococcus (GBS) DNA in Lim Broth cultures after incubation for at least 18 hours, from vaginal and rectal swabs of antepartum pregnant women to aid in determining colonization status.
